mapper.select: SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_type, flow_prompt, flow_seq, flow_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} ORDER BY flow_seq
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_type, flow_prompt, flow_seq, flow_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY flow_seq
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_type, flow_prompt, flow_seq, flow_status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_flow (agent_id, client_id, client_type, flow_prompt, flow_seq, flow_status) VALUES (#{agentId}, #{clientId}, #{clientType}, #{flowPrompt}, #{flowSeq}, #{flowStatus})
